creator: Bob Holt
bio:
I'm Bob Holt, a JavaScript engineer based in Boston. I'm a programmer at Bocoup.

I used to be a C# .NET developer and I've done some PHP. I don't do those things any more (but it's fine if you do).

I'm project lead for Keel and a contributor to Johnny-Five, learn.jquery.com, Bullsfirst, Aura, CeeJS, and the HTML5 Boilerplate Ant Build Script
